name: Escape Labyrinth
description:
my first game

Just a simple game and not spooky suitable for you who want to try horror game but still scared.Gameplay like slenderman game ,you must collect item to win and dont look the ghost.

control:
- AWSD : move
- mouse : look around
- E : pickup item and open door

ghosts will keep chasing you so you have to keep moving and avoid it

#Horror #horror
